meanings.sent1: The generous payer settled the bill for everyone at the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The company's top payer is responsible for handling all financial transactions.
meanings.sent3: The little girl pretended to be a payer at her toy cash register, ringing up imaginary purchases.
meanings.sent4: As the payer of attention to detail, she never missed a single mistake in the report.
meanings.sent5: The diligent payer carefully counted out the exact change for each item.

meanings.definition: A person who makes a payment
meanings.sent1: The online payer entered their credit card information to complete the purchase.
meanings.sent2: The regular payer always makes sure to pay their bills on time.
meanings.sent3: The forgetful payer accidentally paid for the same item twice, much to their dismay.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the generous payer, always willing to help out a friend in need.
meanings.sent5: The responsible payer kept track of all their expenses in a detailed spreadsheet.
